snippet: A teacher’s science demonstration for a 10th-grade class exploded at Beacon High School, hospitalizing a boy with severe burns. A girl was hospitalized and released.
abstract: Chemistry experiment explodes during demonstration by teacher Anna Poole at Beacon High School in Manhattan; explosion created fireball that burned two 10th graders, one severely.

byline.contributor: Al Baker, Erin Banco and Susan C. Beachy contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A teacher’s science demonstration for a 10th-grade class exploded at Beacon High School, hospitalizing a boy with severe burns. A girl was hospitalized and released.

headline.main: Chemistry Lab Fire Injures 2 at a Manhattan High School
headline.print_headline: Chemistry Lab Fire Injures 2 At a Manhattan High School
